help_document.overview: These are a series of use cases on how to analyze Affymetrix data

summary.name: Bioconductor Raw Probe Intensity
summary.description: See how to Run R/Bioconductor to get Raw Probe Intensities from from Cell files

summary.name: RMAExpress
summary.description: Use a stand-alone windows application to pre-process Affymetrix data with RMA method

summary.name: Bioconductor RMA Analysis
summary.description: Use Bioconductor to pre-process Affymetrix data with RMA method

summary.name: Bioconductor RMA and t-test
summary.description: Use Bioconductor to pre-process Affymetrix data with RMA method, followed by t-test for differential expression

summary.name: Make R_CHP files using mas5.0
summary.description: Reproduce Affymetrix CHP files using R/Bioconductor

summary.name: R vs. GCOS MAS5
summary.description: Validate R/bioconductor/affy mas5 against Affymetrix GCOS Software
